title: Coding
description: Creating software and building projects sparked my interest in programming, but it's the thrill of exploring new languages and libraries that keeps me coming back.

title: Hiking
description: Exploring trails and appreciating the serenity of nature allows me to disconnect from the digital world and challenge myself with new hikes, whether in the mountains or along the coast. Recently, I’ve hiked through Franconia Notch during peak foliage and trekked through Waterton Lakes National Park, now seven years removed from the Kenow Fire.

title: Soccer
description: Playing pick-up soccer regularly has become an important part of my routine. It helps me stay fit, maintain discipline, and clear my mind. The game provides a good mix of challenge and enjoyment, making it one of the most refreshing parts of my week. Plus, nothing beats a beautiful tiki-taka goal.

title: Coaching
description: Coaching young athletes at soccer camps, I provide guidance and design drills that develop skills, foster teamwork, and inspire passion for the game. I strive to create an environment where each individual is fully engaged and focusing on what they can uniquely contribute to the team while continuing their development.

title: Tutoring
description: Guiding students through complex topics like programming and computer science, I break down challenging concepts into manageable steps. I foster curiosity through hands-on learning and emphasize productivity by promoting organization.

title: Running
description: Running for fitness and stress relief. Whether it’s a daily jog or down a mountain, running helps me stay healthy and clear my mind.

title: Lifting
description: Weightlifting helps me build strength, enhance fitness, and, most importantly, improve movement. Guided by an incredible trainer at Northeastern, I now prioritize breathing and muscle isolation in every lift.

title: Reading
description: Reading a variety of genres, from technology and mathematics to fiction and philosophy. I’m currently finishing up Pity the Ready by Kurt Vonnegut and, after recently re-acquiring Migraine by Oliver Sacks, I’m excited to dive back into that as well.

title: Concerts
description: Music fuels my creativity and helps me unwind after intense work or training sessions. This is especially true with live music, leading me to see artists like Benson Boone, Dave, Martin Luke Brown, Sammy Rae & Friends, and others in concerts across North America.

title: Writing
description: Writing has always been a calming practice for me, though the subjects I explore tend to ebb and flow. Some periods of my life have been especially rich with words, reflecting my thoughts and experiences.

title: Television
description: Watching sports events, movies, and anime. I enjoy the storytelling and the emotions that come with following different series, sports seasons, or cinematic worlds.

title: Tech Exploration
description: Staying up-to-date with the latest trends in tech, such as AI, machine learning, and open-source tools. I enjoy expanding my skillset by experimenting with new technologies.

title: Traveling
description: Exploring new cities and cultures, seeking out new experiences to broaden my perspective. I love discovering new places, trying new foods, and meeting new people.

title: Fitness Challenges
description: Fitness challenges, like half-marathons, are rewarding, but I find the most fulfillment in running on my own terms. A lifetime of athletics has taught me to stay motivated and push my limits independently.

title: Gaming
description: Playing video games for both relaxation and strategy, I enjoy a wide variety of genres, from competitive FPS to immersive open-world adventures and strategic simulations. Each offers a unique challenge and a refreshing level of focus.

title: Learning Languages
description: I speak both Spanish and Italian with a high level of proficiency, and I’m currently focusing on learning my dad’s dialect, Monopolitanese, to connect more deeply with my Italian heritage and continue expanding my language skills.

title: Podcasts
description: I am an infrequent listener of podcasts, but that trend seems to be shifting. When the mood has struck recently, I have tended to lean towards the Nerd Out podcast by Spotify developers for developers. Great listen both in terms of entertainment and learning tech jargon.
